data.oai_dc:dc: New Zealand Pleistocene cheilostome species zooid size data

These data are from our previous publication (Liow L.H., Di Martino E., Krzeminska M, Ramsfjell M, Rust S., Taylor P.D. & Voje K.L. Relative size predicts competitive outcome through 2 million years. Ecology Letters 20: 981–988) but are needed to plot SI figure 1
